titleStmt.title: The whole .xii. bookes of the Æneidos of Virgill. Whereof the first .ix. and part of the tenth, were conuerted into English meeter by Thomas Phaër Esquire, and the residue supplied, and the whole worke together newly set forth, by Thomas Twyne, Gentleman. There is added moreouer to this edition, Virgils life out of Donatus, and the argument before euery booke
Aeneis. English
titleStmt.author: Virgil.
Phayer, Thomas, 1510?-1560.
Donatus, Aelius.
Twyne, Thomas, 1543-1613.

editionStmt.edition: There is added moreouer to this edition, Virgils life out of Donatus, and the argument before euery booke.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Wyllyam How, for Abraham Veale, dwelling in Poules Churchyearde, at the signe of the Lambe,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
